document_data.name: Cemetery Rot
document_data.mainbody: '''Cemetery rot''' was a [[disease]] that transformed the infected individual into a [[zombie]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Undumor Connection|15-16}}
document_data.Acquisition: Cemetery rot was contracted via a bite from the corrupted and rotting [[undead]] remains of small [[animal]]s, such as [[dog]]s or [[cat]]s.
document_data.Effects: An infected individual immediately found themselves immune to [[magical]] healing. If they were not able to fight off the disease, it would cause their body to rot and steadily deteriorate. If they died of the disease, they then rose as a mindless zombie that hungered for flesh.
document_data.History: The undead carriers of cemetery rot were most often created as the result of botched ''[[raise dead]]'' spells (or similar magics) that had been cast to revive a pet.{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Undumor Connection|13-14}}
